## Malthusianism

- Tension between population growth and food supply

- Generally characterised by pessimism and fatalism

- **Blindspot:** unanticipated technological development

::: {.callout-note}

## Reasons to be Optimistic?

Technologies can have significant, transformative effects on society.
However, they must be shown to work and people need to be persuaded that they are useful.
"Pushing" technologies on consumers requires careful design and communication.

:::
